trans-unit.source: You can use comment-based help in DSC configurations.
trans-unit.target: You can use comment-based help in DSC configurations.

trans-unit.source: Users can access the help by calling the configuration function with `-?`, or by using the [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh849696.aspx) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Users can access the help by calling the configuration function with `-?`, or by using the [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh849696.aspx) cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about PowerShell comment-based help, see [about_Comment_Based_Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh847834.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information about PowerShell comment-based help, see [about_Comment_Based_Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh847834.aspx).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a script that contains two configurations and comment-based help for each configuration:
trans-unit.target: The following example shows a script that contains two configurations and comment-based help for each configuration:

trans-unit.source: To view the help for a configuration, use the **Get-Help** cmdlet with the name of the function, or type the name of the function followed by `-?`.
trans-unit.target: To view the help for a configuration, use the **Get-Help** cmdlet with the name of the function, or type the name of the function followed by `-?`.
